articles.title: Concern grows as bird flu spreads further in US cows: 32 herds in 8 states - Ars Technica
articles.description: Experts say the US is not sharing as much data on the outbreak as it should.
articles.content:
Enlarge/ Greylag geese sit on a field and rest while a cow passes by in the background.

Researchers around the world are growing more uneasy with the spread of highly pathogenic avian influenza… [+5150 chars]

articles.title: Vision Pro Demand Dwindles as Customer Interest Dropped After Initial Hype - Wccftech
articles.description: Users have lost interest in the Vision Pro after initial hype passed, potentially due to a hefty price tag and lower app support.
articles.content: Apple's Vision Pro headset took the AR market by storm with its stunning looks and advanced technology underneath. While the headset had a solid start, the traction has reduced over time, potentially… [+2234 chars]

articles.content: After four action-packed days, the 34th annual Sea Otter Classic —North America's biggest bicycle gathering— packed up on Sunday evening. With 1,100 cycling brands in attendance, there was a lot to b… [+5240 chars]
